channel.title: Making shops tradable..why aint it working
channel.description:
ok i put the npc in the autospawn.cfg, in the client, and the shop.cfg, i can see the npc, but i cant trade him..why is this
thanks[br][size=1]Posted at: November 01, 2006, 07:04:01 PM[/size][hr]does anyone kno wats wrong... :|
